channel.title: Soundtrack download not working?
channel.description: So on the front page of the website there's a link that's supposed to send you to a compiled .zip containing the entire soundtrack, but the link itself seems to be broken. I'm not sure if this is broken or I'm overlooking something, but either way it's a shame that I can't seem to download it.

item.title: Soundtrack download not working?
item.dc:creator: Flavrans
item.description:
The download link goes to “https://www.blackmesagame.com/Black_Mesa_Soundtrack.zip”, which just redirects to “https://www.blackmesasource.com”. Replacing “blackmesagame.com” in the URL with “blackmesasource.com”, however, works:

https://www.blackmesasource.com/Black_Mesa_Soundtrack.zip

or use https:

https://www.blackmesasource.com/Black_Mesa_Soundtrack.zip

Read full topic

item.title: Soundtrack download not working?
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
So on the front page of the website there’s a link that’s supposed to send you to a compiled .zip containing the entire soundtrack, but the link itself seems to be broken. I’m not sure if this is broken or I’m overlooking something, but either way it’s a shame that I can’t seem to download it.
